text: Ezɨ ikɨzir kabar gumazamiziba me uan arazibar gɨn ghuavɨra ikia, egha uari bagha asebar marvir guabar ingari. Egha me marvir guar kaba isa, Israelia fomɨra asebar ziaba fasa mɨghsɨabar pɨn itir danganir ingarizir kabagh arɨki. Egha ikɨzir vaghvaziba uari bagha marvir guabar ingara da isa nguibar me itibagh arɨsi.
